definition[0]: to make something be in a particular state or condition
example[1]: to clarify the situation  (=make it clear)
definition[1]: to fill someone with a particular feeling
example[2]: Spiders terrify me  (=make me very afraid).
definition[2]: to do something in a silly or annoying way
example[3]: to speechify  (=make speeches in a way that shows you are trying to sound important)
definition[3]: to make something or someone be like or typical of a person or group
